entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve workloads experience when customers are changing around feeds #38784
  • dotnet workload restore doesn't restore required SDKs since 8.0.200 #38769
  • MVC View not found when deploying to Azure with Azure DevOps pipeline since SDK 8.0.200 #38766

Closed

  • .NET 9 SDK prints relative path for build artifacts (UX) #38552

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding #38792
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2378822 #38776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework for analysis #38754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38692
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38740
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38712
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38737
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0.3xx] [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
